intro.headline: A Dream Come True
intro.paragraph_1: Some places just feel right from the start. When we, Bas & Linda, found this historic house in Schermerhorn, we knew: this is where we want to welcome guests.
intro.paragraph_2: After months of renovating and decorating, Schermer Eylandt became what we dreamed of — a place to relax, breathe and truly unwind.

testimonial.quote: A warm welcome with breakfast and local tips — we felt right at home.
testimonial.author: Isabelle

hospitality.title: What Hospitality Means to Us
hospitality.paragraph: For us, hospitality means attention and care. It’s in the small details — a fresh cup of coffee, a personal note, a tip for a beautiful walk. We want every guest to feel comfortable and cared for, whether staying for a weekend or a week.

quotes.text: They respond so quickly and are always happy to help.
quotes.author: Kees

quotes.text: The kindest hosts I’ve ever met.
quotes.author: Sooyeong

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy

quote.text: We believe guests should feel at home right away — and leave with a smile.
quote.author: Linda

philosophy.paragraph: Our favorite thing? Seeing guests leave feeling recharged, happy and inspired. That’s what makes it all worthwhile.

cta.title: You're Welcome Here
cta.text: Come and experience it for yourself. Let the calm of the countryside embrace you, enjoy the space, and feel at home at Schermer Eylandt.

seo.title: About Us – Bas & Linda, B&B Schermer Eylandt
seo.description: Meet Bas & Linda — your friendly hosts at Schermer Eylandt in Schermerhorn. Personal, warm and welcoming.
